analysis.key_quote: This proposal to turn career civil services workforce, who have dedicated their lives to the provision of services by the federal government, into “political” employees who will have to fear for their jobs at every turn unless they bow to the whims of those in power, would be devastating to the smooth functioning of the government.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the risks of politicization and the importance of a merit-based system, indicating a strong defense of employee rights and protections.
